docs.text: The Simple Python Project Template Docs ¶ simple_python_project_template . simple_python_project_template . hello ( name = 'World' ) ¶ A simple hello function. Parameters: Name Type Description Default name str A persons name in string format. Default is 'World'. 'World' Returns: Type Description message (str) A greeting for the person, in string format. Source code in simple_python_project_template/simple_python_project_template.py def hello ( name = "World" ): """A simple hello function. Args: name (str): A persons name in string format. Default is 'World'. Returns: message (str): A greeting for the person, in string format. """ message = f "Hello { name } , from the example project." logging . debug ( message ) print ( message ) return message
